0.0.1.name: wordpress/kashflow-for-woocommerce
0.0.1.description:
This plugin links your orders to an online accounts package call KashFlow.

To help with the support of this plugin and to allow us to enhance it's functionality, please create an account with KashFlow.
They offer a 14 Day free trial on their on-line accounting application.

Current functionality:- Automatically add/update customers automatically when orders are place. Generate a sales order & take payment. Assign payments methods to Woocommerce payment gateways.

Tested with WooCommerce version 2.0.10

Looking for a decent on-line accounting package try Kaskflow's free 14 day trial
